net.sf.gogui.gui
Class GuiBoard

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  net.sf.gogui.gui.GuiBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.awt.print.Printable, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, ConstGuiBoard
public final class GuiBoard
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements ConstGuiBoard, java.awt.print.Printable

Graphical display of a Go board. This class does not use go.Board, so it can be used with other board implementations. It uses go.GoPoint for coordinates.

See Also:
Serialized Form

          Callback for clicks on a field.
